excerpt: A spicy twist on a classic favorite!

instructions.name: Cauliflower Crust
instructions: In a large bowl, mix together the cauliflower rice, flaxseeds, almond flour, nutritional yeast, garlic powder, oregano, and salt.
Press the mixture onto a parchment-lined baking sheet, forming a 1/4-inch (6mm) thick crust.
Bake for 15 minutes, then remove from the oven and let cool for 5 minutes.

instructions.name: Buffalo Cauliflower
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together the hot sauce, maple syrup, garlic powder, salt, and melted vegan butter.
Add the cauliflower florets to the bowl and toss to coat.
Spread the cauliflower in a single layer on a separate baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, then remove from the oven and set aside.

instructions.name: Assembling the Pizza
instructions: Evenly spread the vegan mozzarella cheese over the cauliflower crust.
Top the cheese with the buffalo cauliflower.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove from the oven and let cool for 5 minutes before slicing and serving.
Garnish with chopped green onions and cilantro before serving.
